Package sprites

Class Ghost

java.lang.Object
sprites.Enemy
sprites.Ghost
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameVariables
public class Ghost extends Enemy
Ghost is a child of Enemy with attributes and unique images. Testing is found in Enemy.java.
Author:
Andrew Denegar

  • Constructor Details

    • Ghost

      public Ghost(int x, int y, Map<GameVariables.State,List<BufferedImage>> images, int[] PADDING, int attackImages, BufferedImage finalDeathImage)
      Create a ghost, which should be done through a GhostFactory.
      Parameters:
      x - starting x position
      y - starting y position
      images - static images for ghost
      PADDING - image padding to remove for non-moving images
      attackImages - the number of attacking images
      finalDeathImage - the final death image of the ghost
